value:
$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|We will soon arrive at the village...
Alfonse, Sharena, let's not delay.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|O-of course!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Mother... Wouldn't it have been
appropriate for you to have remained
at the castle?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I must concur. We are nearing
Embla's borders... It's not safe here.$k$pYou can trust us to investigate the
situation in the village.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Thank you both. I am sorry for
making you worry due to my
selfish curiosity. But even so...$k$pIf I can, I must see this with my
own eyes.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why's that, Mother?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This may well concern both Askr
and Embla—and their continued
existence.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what is that?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I've never— It's like the whole area is
covered in a shadow of...pure black.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That is where the village should be.
Now it's like it was never there.$k$pWhat happened here?!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$pIs this what you spoke of all those
years ago, my love?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy is here! Ready yourselves
for battle, everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our scouts report no sightings of
anyone from the village...$k$pIt's like the village is completely
closed off by the dark barrier...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|"Closed off"? Alfonse, could it be—$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Cool|This is Embla's doing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla's royal family wields the power
to close gates opened by Askr, but
that is not the power's full extent.$k$pUltimately, it is the power of closure.$k$pThe village was closed off by Embla's
power—closed off from our world
completely. Now it exists nowhere.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If Embla's royal family did this, then
that can only mean that— Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Mother, the road ahead will be
dangerous. Please take a retinue
and return to the castle.$k$pThe Order of Heroes will get to the
bottom of this.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I will go at your insistence, but
please remember these words...$k$pYour father often said, "Askr is
a realm that seeks openness and
peace with others...$k$p"That, however, does not mean it is
defenseless in the face of invaders.$k$p"One who seeks to take advantage of
our openness and comes ill-prepared
for what they'll find...$k$p"will be undone by their own
lust for war."$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I understand. If this is an enemy
attack, I will not be caught unawares.$k$pAny enemy who would bring such
calamity on Askr must be stopped.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|It's no use. Even right up next to the
darkness, nothing is visible on the
other side of the barrier.$k$pWhat can we do for the villagers
trapped in there?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$pIf I throw a pebble in...it disappears
without a sound.$k$pPoking it with a stick, the darkness
consumes whatever portion of the
stick passes the boundary...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What's become of the villagers
who were in the village when
this happened?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, I think we should go in.
Going into the darkness ourselves
is the only way we'll find out wha—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No, Sharena, I cannot allow that.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but why?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Whatever goes beyond the edge of
the darkness disappears. It could be
dust now for all we know.$k$pWe don't have enough information.
It's too risky to try it.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But if the villagers are alive, then they
need our help—and we should get to
them as fast as we can!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Even if they are alive and we do
go in after them...$k$pWe have no way of knowing we'll
be able to get back out—with or
without the villagers.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry, Sharena. This is not my
first choice either, and I'm not even
sure this is the correct way forward.$k$pI know it may look like I'm giving up
on those closed off from the world
within the darkness, but...even so...$k$pAll we can do is continue our
investigation of the area for now.$k$p$Sbs150|
